Outbreak scenarios differ in transmission rates, with and 2.33 in the low-transmission and high-transmission scenarios, respectively. Early estimates of from Wuhan are consistent with a 95% confidence interval (CI)of between 2.1 and 4.5 ( R0 I1:36 2:38 and other measures were implemented.
